actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To revive, and extend until January 1, 1999, the suspension of duty on certain narrow fabric weaving machines.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1998, the suspension of duty on power-driven weaving machines for weaving fabrics not exceeding 30 cm in width.

titles.title: To revive, and extend until January 1, 1999, the suspension of duty on certain narrow fabric weaving machines.
